content: fasten_off last stitch for right paw front edge row 20 decrease p2tog p1 p3tog p1 p2tog - 5sts tail cast off all 5 tail point sts ws facing rejoin yarn cd to the 9 tail sts row 1 increase cast on 4 sts for tail base p13 across - 13 tail sts row 2 increase cast on 4 sts for tail base k17 across - 17 tail sts row 3-5 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 6 decrease k3 skpo k7 k2tog k3 - 15sts row 7-9 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 10 decrease k3 skpo k5 k2tog k3 - 13sts row 11-13 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 14 decrease k3 skpo k3 k2tog k3 - 11sts row 15-17 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 18 decrease k3 skpo k1 k2tog k3 - 9sts row 19 purl new born puppy pattern page 25 new born puppy pattern page 26 join tail seam belly fold the tail point cast-off edge in half with ws together and rs and puppy s back facing you and with tail lying against the back to mattress stitch the two halves together keep it out of the way with yarn b begin at puppy s left rear end marker continue to mattress stitch the row ends from the tail tip seam pick up and knit 7 sts across left rear end row end to the split near the along to the corners of the cast-on edges at the tail base tail pick up and knit 6 sts across tail base cast-on edges 3 stitches - see fig 7 either side of the tail seam you ve just sewn pick up and knit 7 sts across the tail is lightly stuffed leave the cast-on edges un-sewn - it s right rear end row ends from the split near the tail to puppy s right rear across these you will pick up sts for the belly as follows end marker - see fig 8 pick up from a to b b to c c to d - 20 belly sts right rear end tail base left rear end foreleg seam marker cast on marker foreleg seam cast off edges edges cast on edges a d c b tail tail seam seam tail base cast on edges fig 7 fig 8 new born puppy pattern page 27 new born puppy pattern page 28 belly continued row 20-22 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 1 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 18sts cut yarn b join yarn cd continue with yarn cd as follows row 2 decrease k5 skpo k4 k2tog knit to end - 16sts row 23 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 20sts row 3 purl row 24-26 beginning with a purl row work 3 row stocking stitch row 4 decrease k4 skpo k4 k2tog
